title: Starting A War Has Never Been Easier

replies.body:
Me: Sup

Random69: Sup

Me: -.-

Random69: -.-

*rolls up sleeves*
And they proceed to fight for 5 minutes with 20 wards being placed and no one actually taking damage.
"YOU CAN'T POSSIBLY HOPE TO OUT-HEAL ME!!!"

And it's OfA+URF Soraka.

"Guys... guys please... please I can't take the w sound effects anymore. Guys. GUYS STOP PLEASE! FOR THE LOVE OF GOATS!"
